column5: This ranch-style estate is the perfect getaway retreat for families, friends, & associates. Located 5 minutes from the JW Marriott Resort, 10 minutes from The Shops at La Cantera, 20 minutes from Six Flags, Schlitterbahn and Downtown San Antonio, and 25 minutes from the historic Alamo, you can consider this home the perfect base for your Central Texas adventures. At the end of your day, keep soaking in that Old World charm as you wind down on our plush leather couch â€“ Texas pecan brew in hand.
